attributes.review: it should be illegal to have okayed the distribution of this app, let alone to have been allowed to make an app that’s this bad. i get constant nightmares of the giant “T” on the blue background, that only gets worse the moment it takes you to a picture of POTUS looking like he had an accident and is humiliated of the “oopsie” he made in his pants. would not recommend to anyone unless your hobbies include wearing white sheets and denying people their basic human rights.
attributes.title: 🎷🐝 just no

attributes.review: 0/10 stars I downloaded this app and a horrible image of an orange came up then my phone turned into a giant robot and started attacking me and my family yelling death threats with the image of the disgusting orange man, I tried calling the police but they were busy trying to defend themselves at PEACEFUL PROTEST, and now I'm dead, my family’s dead, and my entire neighborhood is dead, the only reason it stopped at my neighborhood is because my phone died
attributes.title: I literally died😭😱

attributes.review: Anyways I was walking home from walking my caterpillar and I was on the App Store looking for new fun apps and then I stumbled across this app and i decided to join it to support that big fat president and I was on it then it started to delete all of my things and all of my pictures with my friends (Sharon,Linda,and,Carol) and I was so sad omg it was horrible do not download it pls it’s horrible and it takes away money every week without our consent 😞
attributes.title: I got hacked 😟

attributes.review: It took so so long to download and when it did it wouldn't open. I went to delete it and it wouldn't let me! I turned my phone off and went to bed. As I was getting ready the next morning I started realizing that downloading it made me and trump supporter. I was being racist and homophobic and all around a horrible person. Please don't download. It will make you vote for a horrible human being and support them. 🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮
attributes.title: The worst app!!!!!!

attributes.review: I downloaded this app to show my support and love for our POTUS. My 3 wives and I were sitting with our 13 children, minding our own business when ALL OF A SUDDEN, My phone GLITCHED OUT!! I was so confused and scared and when I look, I got a warning from Apple saying that my personal information was being leaked. And when I found the source, IT WAS THIS APP!! Turns out they had been sending all my information to North Korea and Russia. DO NOT DOWNLOAD!! They will find you and WILL COME FOR YOU!!!
attributes.title: HELPFUL

attributes.review: i was following directions from my maps app on my phone, and siri told me to turn left... but this app sent me a notification saying “fake news” (and i’ve gotta trust the president, the always correct leader of the now great north america) SO i turned right. i went straight into a cow pasture and in addition to being completely embarrassed in front of 69 cows, i ran over ones hoof. how am i going to ever explain this incident to her :(
attributes.title: the worst decision of my life

attributes.review: I have never had worse service.🤢 they said they didn’t sell the new tyrannosaurus rex6000 so I asked if they sold the stegagofyourself200 and they said no.😤 they have nothing in stock these days, so they don’t deserve my support or money. The app tried to harass me, they had a picture of trump🤮 I would not have downloaded the trump 2020 app if I knew it was gonna have trump on it. In conclusion I must say the app is not worth your time or chicken strips🐓💅.
attributes.title: Disgusting

attributes.review: I downloaded this app🙂 to see what mr cheeto puff man was up to of course🙈, but then a weird song was playing from my phone😰I’m not really sure what it was😣 but it sounded a little bit like this: “She👩🏽 like🌂Papî 🍰I 🍾adore 💘you🤸‍♀️I'm 🛍like 🩸Baby 🎀 I 🖍ain't 💅normal👩‍🦯Rrrrr 🦁 🦁🦁 foreigner 💞 foreigner 💞 foreigner💞” so because of this I rate the app 1 star,😔it’s absolutely terrible🤢, not the song of course😹but the app in general😡did not have my consent to play this song🤨 so definitely dont🙅🏻‍♀️recomend mr cheeto puffs app😰!
attributes.title: 💕💘förêïgńër🥰😹

attributes.review: I downloaded this app so I could stay up to new with our current US President but it just glitches and doesn't even work. Crashes ever time I open it. The bugs are so bad. WAYYY too many ads. Absolutely horrible. This app is terrible. The worst app I've probably ever used. Nothing good about it whatsoever. A complete waste of space on my phone. I really wish I never downloaded it. Disappointing and a mistake to download. DONT DOWNLOAD THIS APP IT IS TERRIBLE. IT DOESNT EVEN WORK!!!!!
attributes.title: Worst App Ever

attributes.review: I thought I would download this app and get updates about the beautiful man in office. What I got was much worse, I opened the for 2 SECONDS and all of a sudden I started to change color on my fingertip. I WAS TURNING ORANGE, idk what this is but I deleted it IMMEDIATELY, all I want to do is support my fellow oranges BUT I DONT WANT TO BE ONE. Maybe if I say I want to date my daughter or build a wall it will get better, but I’m suffering, I think I’m infected, and you might be NEXT!!!!!!
attributes.title: I started turning orange TERRIBLE!!!!!!🧚🏼
